about_the_game:
"Saturn" is a tactical RPG set on Earth and on the moons of Saturn. The hero must prevent the end of the world in three days by solving the riddle of a mysterious signal from the depths of space.

After installing the DLC and downloading the files, go to the game folder, there will be an Saturn OST directory containing files with the MP3 extension.

Tracklist:

01 - ZERO GRAVITY 
02 - SATELLITE 
03 - ROBOT 
04 - REFLECTION 
05 - LOTUS FLOWER 
06 - DATA STREAM 
07 - MALFUNCTION 
08 - MORNING 
09 - DAY OFF 
10 - BEACON

By CUTGLITCH

"Saturn" is a tactical RPG set on Earth and on the moons of Saturn. The hero must prevent the end of the world in three days by solving the riddle of a mysterious signal from the depths of space.

After installing the DLC and downloading the files, go to the game folder, there will be an Saturn OST directory containing files with the MP3 extension.

name: Saturn Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 600 MB available space

short_description: Official soundtrack of the role-playing game "Saturn". Enhanced versions of musical compositions from the game.
